NHK Nagakura's mom----"He's always seemed so much _more mature_ that 
other children his age...."

NHK Heisuke Todo's mom--"Yes he is a pathetic little geek but we love 
him..."

NHK Hijikata and Yamanami's mom's---"Look at those two, you'd think they 
were scheming and plotting behind the little Serizawa boy's back."

Father of Mibugishiden's Saitou to his wife---"Care to tell me why "our" 
son looks so much like that Serizawa boy over there???"

--
